doc.field: New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
New York Foundation For the Arts (NYFA) Records
Series I. Administrative and Human Resources Records
Series I. Administrative and Human Resources Records

This series consists of materials created by NYFA's administrative and human resources staff from the early 1970s up until the late 2010s. The Human Resources files include employee surveys, applications, resumes and general correspondence between NYFA and employees. The administrative files include NYFA organizational material such as leases, environmental complaints, search for new space, and other general files.
